thread.title: Unhappy crowd shows up at Mike Coffman’s regular meeting with constituents
thread.title_full: Unhappy crowd shows up at Mike Coffman’s regular meeting with constituents

author: Tamara Chuang
title: Unhappy crowd shows up at Mike Coffman’s regular meeting with constituents
text: blog comments powered by Disqus More in Colorado Politics Colorado homeowners will get a tax break, thanks to TABOR’s lesser-known cousin. But local governments will be squeezed. January 14, 2017, 1:30 am A little-understood provision of the state constitution will provide property tax relief for homeowners across the state next year, but could have cascading financial consequences for virtually all levels of Colorado government. Mike Coffman proposes legislation to protect young immigrants January 13, 2017, 4:07 pm U.S. Rep. Mike Coffman of Colorado this week joined a bipartisan group of lawmakers in introducing legislation that would shield from deportation hundreds of thousands of young immigrants who were illegally brought to the U.S. as children. Colorado governor calls for tax ballot measure to address transportation January 13, 2017, 5:43 am Gov. John Hickenlooper asked lawmakers to send a tax hike measure to the November ballot to build and repair the state’s roads, calling on Colorado to “invest in our future.” Partisanship in the Donald Trump era overshadows first day of Colorado legislative session January 12, 2017, 11:00 am Colorado’s top lawmakers struck starkly different tones to open the 2017 legislative session Wednesday, with Democratic leaders in the state House calling for cooperation even as Republicans outlined a partisan agenda and proposed repealing the state’s health insurance exchange.
